entry.title: Russia Bombards Kyiv as European Leaders Arrive in Ukraine's Capital
entry.content: The delegation met with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky amid heightened fighting in the capital’s outskirts and no apparent progress in talks to end the invasion.

entry.title: Abramovich Investment Vehicle Shifted Control Shortly After Invasion
entry.content: Roman Abramovich’s global empire, including his Chelsea soccer team, has been upset by scrutiny and sanctions since Russia invaded Ukraine.

entry.title: Inside Chernobyl, 200 Exhausted Staff Toil Round the Clock at Russian Gunpoint
entry.content: Trapped since their shift 3 weeks ago, the Ukrainians keeping the abandoned nuclear plant safe are ill-fed, stressed and desperate for relief. “Everyone wants to go home.”

entry.title: Rollback of Xi Jinping's Economic Campaign Exposes Cracks in His Power
entry.content: In addition to pressure from the West on Beijing over Xi’s Russian entente, he is struggling with a severe slowdown in the economy. The new disquiet raises questions about his unassailed dominance.
